title: Blended Learning-Based Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of science curriculum content and basic teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: A course where working professionals with job experience enhance classroom application abilities through blended learning design. Practice-oriented operation utilizing simulation/VR tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can develop science curriculum lesson plans by applying blended learning design principles

After 2 weeks of VR simulation training, learners assume the role of a teacher in three science experiment scenarios (chemical reactions, ecosystem observation, physics law application) and demonstrate instructional competency by achieving 4+ points (out of 5) in four of five peer evaluation rubric items (clarity of explanation, interaction, error correction).
Learners create student engagement-focused lesson materials using ICT tools and analyze their effectiveness
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
